import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Nft = ({nft}) => { const { base64Img, category, coco_url, collection, date_captured, file_name, file_path, flickr_url, generated_caption, height, id, license, original_caption, similarity, width } = nft return (

{collection}

{generated_caption}

{original_caption}

Details
) } export default Nft
